item.description: I am a data scientist by profession. Currently Iâ€™m working in the higher education industry. Before moving into the area of Data Science, I worked in market research and product management. I like the constant improving nature of the technologies used in data science and Machine Learning areas and love to experiment with new tools and methodologies. While not working, I enjoy travelling, catching fish, watching movies, learning about new technology and watching documentaries on random topics!
